Req Tst
func:
var data={
    request: {
        nadr:  "0x0001",
        pnum:  "0x5E",
        pcmd:  "0xB1",
        hwpid: "0x0002",
        err:   "0x00",
        dpa:   "0x5D",
        pdata0: "0x01",
        pdata1: "0xB0",
        pdata2: "0x01",
        pdata3: "0x01",
        pdata4: "0x88",
        pdata5: "0x01",
        pdata6: "0x81",
        pdata7: "0x52",
        pdata8: "0x81",
        pdata9: "0x2D"
    },
}
msg.payload=data.request;
return msg;
